alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:58PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Pueblo County through 545 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of strong winds associated with thunderstorms along a line extending from Boone to near Avondale to 11 miles southeast of Blende to 10 miles south of Salt Creek. These strong winds are extending well ahead of thunderstorm activity. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Pueblo, Boone, Avondale, Pueblo Depot, Salt Creek and Blende. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
